General.Name: CF Acquisition VII Corp
General.Description: CF Acquisition Corp. VII does not have significant operations. The company focuses on effecting a merger, capital stock exchange, asset acquisition, stock purchase, reorganization, or similar business combination with one or more businesses. It intends to focus on companies in the financial services, healthcare, real estate services, technology, and software industries. The company was incorporated in 2020 and is based in New York, New York.
General.Address: 110 East 59th Street, New York, NY, United States, 10022
